title: Leaver Buster not doing its job
body: I got LeaverBusted for my client crashing for the first 10 minutes of a game, when i fixed it i went back in and i played with no interruptions at all. When the game was finished it gave me a message saying that I have LeaverBuster for 5 games. To me this is bullshit and unfair seeing as its not my fault in anyway that the client crashed.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=TraceRFighter,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=zi3Minpt,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-22T01:24:31.791+0000)
>
> I got LeaverBusted for my client crashing for the first 10 minutes of a game, when i fixed it i went back in and i played with no interruptions at all. When the game was finished it gave me a message saying that I have LeaverBuster for 5 games. To me this is bullshit and unfair seeing as its not my fault in anyway that the client crashed.

Riot is frucked in the head and don't know what a fair system is I am afraid.

Either they don't have the man power helping people out or they are just too lazy to attend to the needs of every single individual to make their job easier. So make a mass rule that applies no matter what happens, it could be your fault or Riot's fault.

[Suggest you read up on this.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

But it's pretty long, so here's the jist: Leaverbuster will only punish you if you have multiple leave markers on your account (which you accumulate for every game you leave) and/or have a negative reputation (according to how frequently you've been reported and by whom). If it was just one game in which you disconnected from, then you shouldn't get any penalty. If you've constantly been disconnecting from games, then you need to avoid playing bots or match-made games until you've fixed it.

Riot's policy on the matter is that they will never remove a low priority queue off a player under any circumstances, and thus far have stuck to it.

If you believe that you've been wrongly punished, submit a [support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to help make aware of the flaw in their system.
